description:
沪江英乐：Sara Bareilles 超励志单曲《Brave》!Sara Bareilles 真是一个根源的创作人，这首歌汇聚流行摇滚、电音流行、钢琴摇滚，总之大爱。早在 Ellen show 上听第一遍就喜欢了，励志正能量！

【Sara Bareilles 超励志单曲《Brave》】

歌词：

You can be amazing
You can turn a phrase into a weapon or a drug
You can be the outcast
Or be the backlash of somebody's lack of love
Or you can start speaking up
Nothing's gonna hurt you the way that words do
When they settle 'neath your skin
Kept on the inside and no sunlight
Sometimes the shadow wins
But I wonder what would happen if you

Say what you wanna say
And let the words fall out
Honestly I wanna see you be brave

With what you want to say
And let the words fall out
Honestly I wanna see you be brave

I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I wanna see you be brave

I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I wanna see you be brave

Everybody's been there, everybody's been stared down
By the enemy
Fallen for the fear and done some disappearing
Bow down to the mighty
Don't run, stop holding your tongue
Maybe there's a way out of the cage where you live
Maybe one of these days you can let the light in
Show me how big your brave is

Say what you wanna say
And let the words fall out
Honestly I wanna see you be brave

With what you want to say
And let the words fall out
Honestly I wanna see you be brave

And since your history of silence
Won't do you any good
Did you think it would?
Let your words be anything but empty
Why don't you tell them the truth?

Say what you wanna say
And let the words fall out
Honestly I wanna see you be brave

With what you want to say
And let the words fall out
Honestly I wanna see you be brave

I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I want to see you be brave

I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I want to see you be brave

I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I just want to see you
I want to see you be brave

I just want to see you
I just want to see you.

  • 生命的力量：两条腿奔跑的励志狗狗

description:
忍者神龟 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)

导演: 乔纳森·里贝斯曼
编剧: Josh Appelbaum / Andrew Nemec / Art Marcum / Matt Holloway / John Fusco
主演: 梅根·福克斯 / 阿兰·里奇森 / 诺尔·费舍 / 威廉·菲德内尔 / 威尔·阿奈特 / 乌比·戈德堡 / 阿比·埃利奥特 / Jeremy Howard / 丹尼·伍德伯恩 / Minae Noji
类型: 动作 / 科幻
制片国家/地区: 美国
语言: 英语
上映日期: 2014-08-08(美国)
又名: 真人版忍者神龟

预告片：

剧情简介：

城市需要英雄来拯救，黑暗降临纽约，大反派施莱德和他率领的异族用铁腕压制一切，从警察到政客都被其所控制。神龟们和无畏的女记者爱普莉尔以及聪明的摄像师菲诺通力合作，摧毁施莱德的恐怖计划，让这座城市重新恢复宁静。

From their home in the storm sewers of Manhattan, four Ninjitsu-trained turtles, Leonardo, Raphael, Michelangelo and Donatello and their sensei, Master Splinter, battle evil.
